attributes.action: abandon plans to fund a show by Jeremy Kyle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Guardian has revealed that "the government is in talks with ITV about spending almost half a million pounds on a television series aimed at getting people off benefits and back to work, fronted by Jeremy Kyle, the controversial talk show host".

We believe that taxpayers' money could be better spent on just about anything rather than the promotion Jeremy Kyle, a man so repellent that the Dead Ringers parody is virtually indistinguishable.
